website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy mirror for a fraction of the cost of some other models. A terrific value.
pros: Attractive finish, lightweight, and easy to assemble
Consumers appreciate the stylish look of this affordable package
cons: Some criticisms of the overall design
A few consumers have received products with scratches on the frame

customer_reviews.title: Nice wood framed mirror
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this mirror and I'm so glad I did! The mirror was packaged well for protected shipping and assembled very easily in no time. It's a nice floor Cheval mirror that allows me to see clearly from head to toe, and it looks great in a corner of a room. No, this does not look cheap like the run of the mill plastic framed mirrors that you see at local supercenter stores, and you can see the nice wood grains on the frame. It looks much more costly than the price I've paid, and I'm definitely satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RescueMa

customer_reviews.title: Legs Needs a better and more stable support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mirror in Dec 2017. Be careful when moving. Over time the legs wobble. The legs should be better build. If you move it much the screws have to be tightened.....over and over. Wish it was more stable. Please note the video and picture. There is a stress crack on the leg. Ive had this mirror for Approx. 4 months. Update..july 2018...As expected the legs on mirror broke. They are too thin.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, excellent price, easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely obsessed with this mirror. I cannot believe the quality for the price!! It took 5 mins to put together and it is beautiful. I used to only buy the cheap $5 ones from Walmart but after it shattered I decided to up my game a little. I Ann SO happy I did. Mirrors like this go for hundreds of dollars at the store. Can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: A PERFECT MIRROR FOR ANYBODY
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a full length mirror for months. Everywhere in stores or online they all were very expensive & not even close to this mirror (in size & quality). This one dont make you look like you are fat or skinny.I look exactly how I am in this mirror & I am very satisfied with this purchase.They shipeed it very carefully (double packed).Easy to assemble.It can enhanced the beauty of any room.I highly recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Minal

customer_reviews.title: If only..
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my better half because she needed to see her "whole outfit". So I found this on a lightning deal and decided to give it a shot. The color and size are perfect for my room. Only problem is the amount of damage to the bezel surrounding the mirror and the feet. It's not scratched, just severley dented. It was shipped in very secure packaging. So it either got to the warehouse this way or bad QC at the factory. Just be warned. Hopefully mine is a one-off.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy, piece of crap... I don't​ usually do review but I have to on this item. Mirror(glass) is in good shape, no cracks however, the wood is of poor quality. Wood is broken and cracked​ that I have to glue it up. Part of wood is eaten by termites. Pictures are attached so view them. Buy at your own risk!
customer_reviews.author: Mckiito

customer_reviews.title: Untilted at 5 ft., it's basically for short people
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, except if you're a tall person, you have to really tilt the mirror to see your whole reflection. Assembled, its height is almost only 5 ft. As of this writing, there are no dimensions listed by the seller. Before I bought this, I relied on other buyers' comments re dimensions. Now I kinda regret that I went ahead and bought it anyway. I will try to fix it to add height, like boring upper holes to the L & R arms (about 1 1/2 inches above the first holes), then making the stand a little bit higher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT....
customer_reviews.text: So a month later after I purchased this mirror... the back developed wood dust and mold. VERY CANCEROUS to inhale over a big period of time. Look at the picture the little sign in the back tells you that wood dust is cancerous and they still sell it.
customer_reviews.author: isaac caries

customer_reviews.title: I think this is an excellent mirror for the money
customer_reviews.text: I think it's VIP to consider the price v. quality of this mirror and when you do, I think this is an excellent mirror for the money. There are certainly other standing mirror options out there that are more 'heavy duty' feeling and are made from higher quality wood but this little guy is great for what you pay. Mine came in perfect condition, no scratches in the wood. The mirror was not cracked, chipped or broken. It's a 5 minute job to put it together (I did it by myself) and it has a nice quality look. I'm using it in my bathroom and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Molly S

customer_reviews.title: I’d highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I assembled the mirror in 30 minutes or less! My mirror fortunately did not arrive broken unlike some other people’s experiences. The finish is stunning for the price. I would absolutely recommend this to anyone, I bought this mirror at $45 and I am blown away with the quality for that price. Only downside I notice is, if you move and angle the mirror frequently, The two bolts in the center do you get slightly loose. This is not a big deal for me because I don’t change the angle of the mirror often enough.
customer_reviews.author: Hector I. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy and surprised at just how nice this mirror is for the amount I paid. My husband took it out of the box and had it put together and set-up in the bedroom while I made dinner. The only tool needed to put it together was a Philips Head screw driver. I am so happy with this purchase!! The first thing our cat did was jump up against the mirror and it remained sturdy and stable.
customer_reviews.author: T. McCann

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for the price, packaging can be a problem, great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Our first one arrived shattered, and Amazon replaced it with no problems quite quickly. So, we have an extra set of legs and hardware if we ever need it. (And a big frame that will serve some craft purpose.) We purchased this for our daughter to use while taking dance classes with her studio online so she could keep an eye on her technique. This will suit the purpose beautifully and will be easy to put aside when she isn't in class. She was able to put it together herself in less than 5 minutes and she is not quite 10.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda JS

customer_reviews.title: love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: If you've researched mirrors you find they are not cheap. Well naturally I'm a thrifter and I love great deals when I'm buying new. I did see reviews about damage upon opening the package so that was my only concern but mine arrived in perfect condition. I love that I can move it around when needed & I haven't had any issues with it coming apart or lose etc. It took no time to put it together by myself. it's a great dark color for my liking and highly recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Nay Hubb

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when unpackaging, VERY FRAGILE.
customer_reviews.text: This might have been a fantastic mirror, who knows. I had one friend hold it while I pulled it out of the box from the top, and without bending it at all, the entire mirror shattered instantly. Completely wasted my money. When opening, cut the entire box open while it lies flat, and unpackage it that way to hopefully avoid making the same mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: They arrived well packaged & were in good condition. The only complaint is the smell of ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these mirrors. They arrived well packaged & were in good condition. The only complaint is the smell of the cardboard on the back - seems to smell like mildew but doesn't look mildewed. I've sprayed twice with Lysol & they are beginning to smell better. Don't know what the reason is for the smell because the frame doesn't have the smell - just the cardboard. Quality of mirror & frame & stand is good for the price. If not for smell, would give it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Well made, clear, attractive and useful for the long-term.
customer_reviews.text: This is a handsome mirror that works exactly as these mirrors are designed to do. It is intuitive to assemble -- good because mine came without assembly instructions. The parts are sturdy, and the bolts long enough to hold the wood firmly together. The pre drilled holes have metal collars to receive the bolts giving a permanence to the connections. The finish looks good on the wood and the mirror is clear. The mirror came well packed and undamaged. It is a standing full length mirror, meant for long use and a reasonable amount of adjustment. It's a unisex style and perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: STowsley USA

customer_reviews.title: Broken but beautiful; Painless refund process
customer_reviews.text: Came completely shattered which makes me so sad because it’s gorgeous!! Exactly what I wanted; I’ll definitely be reordering this item! I give it the 5 stars because although it was broken, I can tell that I would’ve loved it. Also 100% kudos to amazon for a hassle free refund...no hoops to jump through and no third degree harassment or anything like that! Absolutely pain free!
customer_reviews.author: Arelis Roman

customer_reviews.title: happy!
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice mirror for the price! both arrived un broken due to the great protected packaging! although it was obvious they were handled a bit rough on their journey! if someone receives a broken mirror! I would not blame it on the seller! this is some of the best protected packaging I have seen! the holes on the uprights where the mirror swivels are just a tad off center! just make sure you match the holes parallel to each other ! this works great! I am very HAPPY! with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: rtc

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! Kiss those over the wall mirrors goodbye. Wish I could add a photo. What happened to that feature? Took me maybe 10 minutes to set up after work. The wood and mirror look very nice and big quality. I hate that it came in styrofoam...but the mirror was intact so I’m grateful it did the job Also is does have a cardboard like backing kind of like a picture frame. Meh still 5/5 for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dana ❤️

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the least expensive floor mirror because it was needed solely for music practice. I wasn't expecting much for quality but it is a beautiful piece of furniture. With how inexpensive it is along with the fact that it's real wood, I do wonder how environmentally UNfriendly the product is (I usually look for "environmentally sustainable" when buying wood furniture) BUT it's mine now and it's beautiful and definitely does the job I need it to do, so will try not to worry about any environmental damage that may have been caused getting it to me...cause I can't undo it now!
customer_reviews.author: E Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was inexpensive and I figured it would be ok. It is so much more than ok! It is beautiful! It looks much better than I thought that it would. I have had several family members comment on it. For the price, it is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BROKE WITHIN WEEKS
customer_reviews.text: This is great to look at but the leg BROKE within 3 weeks. I taped it together because I was too busy to deal with it right away and then I saw that I couldn't even return it because I waited too long. This item is a real piece of something I can't say here.
customer_reviews.author: liz michalski

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble by Yourself
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble this with just a Phillips head screw driver. Awesome because I hate putting stuff together and I live alone so usually don't have anyone to help out. I was able to assemble it on the floor and didn't need a 2nd person to help hold anything. You don't need any power tools and the directions are easy to understand. Beautiful mirror too; seems well made for the money. Dark brown espresso finish. What a steal for 40-something dollars! Looks like it cost much more. :)
customer_reviews.author: C. Schellhorn

customer_reviews.title: Good full length mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Moved in to a new apartment and it didn’t have a full length mirror! This was perfect it matched the color or the wood of my bed and dresser. Very easy to assemble and easy to adjust to get the right angle! It was also reasonably priced and looks elegant and expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Monti

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but not an heirloom piece.
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is a great product for its price. It was quick and easy to assemble. The mirror is a good quality and doesn't distort the image. My biggest complaint about it is that the frame is made from a soft wood which dents easily, and the wood was even dented in places before the stain was applied. It's not a deal breaker because it's not super noticeable unless you get close, but it is something to consider. This isn't an heirloom piece, but it really does look pretty good, it's stylish, and it functions perfectly as a full-length mirror.
customer_reviews.author: R. R. Pullen

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror. No instructions?
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t get assembly instructions, so here what you need: a Phillips screwdriver. The four long screws go through the V shape into the end of the long bars. The 4 shorter screws hold the shorter cross bar. I put the washers on the outside of the bars for the decorative screws that hold the mirror. I assembled it flat on carpet, and waited until the mirror was attached before tightening all the screws. Use hand tools to prevent over tightening. Wood finish is fine and consistent. Mirror is flat without any discernible distortion. Reasonably stable, but I would keep this away from children or large rambunctious pets.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I think I got a damaged product..
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed.. The mirror itself seems nice enough but the stand is another story. The pieces are all different colors and I can see a crack already forming on one of the sides, it is causing it to wobble at the lightest touch. I don't think it will be a standing mirror for long, probably more of a leaning against the wall type mirror. I'm going to reach out to the seller for a replacement beam or something... Hopefully..
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: This one may be small but you can see your whole length of the body from 4 feet away in a certain angle(I'm 6' 1"). The mirror does not feel cheap at all, it is very well built and easy to install. Took me about 20 mins to install. The angle of the mirror is easy to adjust.The only complaint I have is that the stand is a little wobbly, first I thought I installed the foot wrong, so, I reversed it, the result is still the same. since I use it on a carpet, it does not affect me much.
customer_reviews.author: Zeus

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Easy to assemble. Delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Mirror delivered within 2 days. Very well packaged and labeled as being fragile. Looks great and seems to be very sturdy. Had a couple minor annoyances when assembling, one or 2 of the screws just didn't want to screw in for some reason. Unscrewed them and screwed the other side in first then the screws lined up. No big deal. We put this in the corner of our bedroom and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: This mirror works fine for my wife and I as we both prefer different angles while looking into mirror. With one small nudge the mirror adjusts to a perfect angle and makes the job much easier.
customer_reviews.author: SujD

customer_reviews.title: Missing screws
customer_reviews.text: So, without the proper screws, you cannot attach the legs. I went to Home Depot to buy some, so you have to add 5 dollars and so to the price. I send an email to the vendor and I did not have any reply. Even with, the new screws, it is really bobbling. One of the feet came shipped also. I would love an idea to fix the leg or put different ones. Not sure how, but as it is, it does not work. I would have put 1 star, but the mirror seems ok if I could find a way to stand it properly without fear that it will fall.
customer_reviews.author: Soizic Cifuentes

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror. Esp for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good mirror. Not as narrow as some suggested. Others were accurate about the height though. I'm short so it's fine for me, but my guy is 6'2" and he has to tilt it or stand a few feet away. If you were to mount it on the wall, you could mount it higher? I'm satisfied. Pieces were not damaged and all included. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Tully

customer_reviews.title: Best standing mirror out there
customer_reviews.text: I looked high and low for the full-length floor mirror that wouldn't break my wallet ($100 or less) and came across this gem. Packed super well; no broken pieces or missing parts. Mirror was great quality; no distortion whatsoever. I love the tilting feature as it allows for people taller than me (5'2") to be able to adjust and use as well. I had no issues with the legs being wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Has Held Up Well for 6 months and Continues to be a Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: The quality, size, color and style are as advertised. No problem to adjust the slant of the mirror as needed. It is sturdier than I expected. We use it to make sure my son has the right sitting posture for his back therapy. It can easily be moved around the home.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Bolender

customer_reviews.title: It's not a showpiece
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with this one. It's easy enough to assemble. It tilts. I wouldn't expect it to last a lifetime. It had a small nick on arrival. I'm sure a little brown shoe polish or marker will cover that up just fine. It's not a showpiece but I knew that when I ordered something at this price range. I'm sure it will do what it was designed to do, sit and reflect.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Hulsey

customer_reviews.title: Ordered twice. First one was broken. Second one was good
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, this arrived with a shattered mirror. Packing isn't sufficient for shipping. Returned without a problem (though it is a hassle to repack & drop off at UPS). Decided to roll the dice and order again since the price is good. The second one arrived OK and the glass survived. Assembly was simple and fast. Works well if you get one that isn't broken.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: overall a good floor mirror with small problems
customer_reviews.text: The floor mirror is sturdy and easy to assemble, good quality in general, just has some small problems. There are some scratches on the frame, and color is uneven, there is a smell of moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but needs a long, thin Philips head
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much - pretty easy to assemble also, and I'm not terribly "handy". The packaging was excellent, great protection. The four stars is because you'll need a long, thin Philips head screw driver., and the site should warn you about that The first 3 I tried weren't long or thin enough. Fortunately, the fourth worked, but be aware that the bottom legs screw on from the inside, so long screws (provided) need long screw driver. No distortion at all. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this mirror. It was so inexpensive so I didn’t know what to expect but it is sturdy and was super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Exactly what I was looking for. Just a decent, basic, full mirror that wouldn’t break the bank. Sure it isn’t the highest of ends but it’s quality for the price. Elegant looking, easy assembly, large enough but doesn’t take up too much space. Arrived well packaged. Really worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and more....
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a simple standing mirror and this color matched our furniture, good price so I decided to order. However, what I didn't expect was the weight and finish of it... I was pleasantly surprised. Literally took not even 10 minutes to assemble, sturdy and doesn't feel light or cheap. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ariane

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and cheap but what i expected for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, came packaged decently. I can't really complain about the price but every time you tilt the mirror you kind of have to retighten the screws because it's not really meant to swivel, it sits on the threads of the screws which isn't a bad thing just a cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeExample

customer_reviews.title: Great quality mirror
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mirror a month ago and I love it. It was easy to assemble, the mirror is made of great quality materials and it's heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Msvip107

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror. Definitely worth it for the price. I was a little nervous after reading some reviews that said their mirror arrived broken. Fortunately, my mirror arrive in pretty good condition. My only complaint is that the 1 of the holes for the screw was blocked by a tiny piece of wood, so i had to jam a flathead in there and push it out but that didn’t interfere with the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: 2ddles

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo...I wanted a full-length mirror. The realization came that only being able to view half my body wouldn't cut it while getting ready. I wanted something that looked nice in my room and was sturdy. This fit the bill! I love that I can tilt it (since I'm tall)--so I can see my whole body! It's great and looks really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie M

customer_reviews.title: Product was damaged
customer_reviews.text: Opened this box on Christmas and was met with pieces of shattered glass that fell to the floor. Mirror is now on its way to the dump.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Best Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror. Off the ground at just the right to get the perfect view of oneself in the mirror. Great for someone who sews to measure other people. I love it. They have great customer service as I got a response right away from them. Thank you for a great product and great service.
customer_reviews.author: R. Black

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is perfect especially for the price of most mirrors these days. It was so easy to assemble and is sturdy. The mirror itself can be just leaned or mounted with no worry about it bending and breaking due to the sturdy frame. The mirror doesn’t distort and has a clear reflection. Was also packaged well to prevent breaking
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Bruzgulis

customer_reviews.title: BUY SOMETHING ELSE
customer_reviews.text: The way in which this is constructed is so flimsy I ended up using a lot of glue and clamped it until dry to hold it together because the screw holes are drilled crooked and too shallow for the hardware. Its not worth the hassle. the mirror itself is small and looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: LOVELY CHEVAL MIRROR
customer_reviews.text: I put this together myself, while watching TV. Very simple, and all that was needed was a Phillips screwdriver. Quality mirror, no fun house waves going across it. The wood is an espresso color and works really well with my other bedroom furniture. Finally I can see myself before I leave the house. The price was unbeatable... less than advertised stores. Happiness !!
customer_reviews.author: MOONZMAGICK

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is absolutely beautiful. I like the color so much. Super easy to assemble. Literally 5 mins. Highly recommended to anyone who is looking for a great mirror at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Lilesh Ingle

customer_reviews.title: Sooo happy!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews, I was terrified that my mirror was going to come crushed or broken. But as we unboxed it, it was in perfect condition and only took a total of 12 minutes to put together with a few attachments. Such a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: A. Muse

customer_reviews.title: Decent value
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor, and buy some wood glue with this mirror. If you don’t already have some. It is fairly flimsy, and could benefit for a few drops of glue at the assembly points. I like this mirror, decent looking at a good price. Serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for floor mirror
customer_reviews.text: My ex girlfriend wanted a mirror at my house so she can "get ready". I didn't want to spend a bunch of money so I bought this product. Assembly was easy and took 10 mins by myself. Even though my ex and I are not together I decided to keep the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I had vowed never to review again but Inwas so impressed with this arrival and condition of the product,I could not resist. This arrived to me in Alaska and in perfect condition and as expected if not better quality than I imagined. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Mirror that is beautiful and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mirror for my wife since the last one (ikea product) fell over and broke due to its flimsy nature. This mirror is super easy to build and looks amazing. The package arrived safely and the Amazon delivery man was kind to ring the bell and asked me if he could help me put it in the garage since it was raining. The mirror is sturdy and doesn’t shake. It’s worth it for the price. 9/10
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Choi

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good mirror. Was not broken. Looks simple and gorgeous. Delivery was with care. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is absolutely worth the price. Its very pretty, and easy to put together. The quality seems decent enough, although it could be a tad bit unsteady if you don't screw the sides in perfectly. BUT i love it. 10/10 highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t come broken so that was already a huge relief. It took like 2 minutes to put together and it looks fantastic. For only like $50 it’s very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: the bottom screws that go up through floor stands have to go up a very long tunnel and you can't see what the screw diver is doing in there very hard to do and I couldn't get the screws tight enough for the stand to. be stable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Easy to put together (a second person to hold mirror while attaching is helpful but not necessary). Reasonable sturdy. I don’t expect to move it much. Mirror is fine. Total height with base and mirror 59 1/4” which works fine (and tilts if needed)
customer_reviews.author: AmyAFL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wooden mirror for a small bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mirror for a family member they were very happy with it. It matched there bedroom set. I was glad they took My advice they were looking at the cheap ones that were plastic for the door and this was just perfect. Easy to put together the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. JuLiAnNa 🐈💟

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. Easy to assemble, fits product descriptions, good quality. Panel pivots on a horizontal axis (imaginary) to adjust the height; tip down a little if you want to reflect lower and pivot up to reflect higher.
customer_reviews.author: Pienaluna

customer_reviews.title: Broken Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Did indeed read some reviews that stated their items arrived broken. Add me to that list. It’s expected to return this item for a refund to be processed. No way. Bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Perez

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I searched forever trying to find a mirror that would match my existing furniture and this one matches perfectly! I wasn’t expecting much for the price, but the mirror is extremely sturdy and looks like it was designed to be part of my bedroom set, rather than an afterthought. I’m not handy at all and it maybe took me 15 minutes to put together. I’d definitely purchase this mirror again!
customer_reviews.author: BriHG24

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble, feels solid and the mirror is crystal clear. It feels so much more elegant and nice for pictures than my old cheap ten dollar mirror i got when I first moved out. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror
customer_reviews.text: Mirror was delivered in perfect condition, very quickly. It’s sturdy, easy assembly, and is nicer than I was expecting. Definitely recommend, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: works as intended
customer_reviews.text: just ordered a second one - good price point. Update: Second order arrived undamaged and happy with purchase - base support is stable providing you well tighten the supplied screws - packaged carefully and Amazon ensured quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Myost Pitts

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price. Slightly poor quality. Some pieces have sloppy finish.
customer_reviews.text: One of the screw holes was filled with wood stain. I tried to force the screw into it but ended up stripping the screw. Too much of a hassle to try and return and replace this large item so I'm using it with one screw missing. Hopefully it stays together. Also, the mirror sits a bit crooked (unrelated to the missing screw). I'm keeping this mirror in my garage so it doesn't need to look that great. If you want to have it in your home, not sure I would recommend it although it's OK for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Ykat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together. Not the sturdiest thing but it’s not gonna fall over and break. I have a cat and a Roomba who push up against it and stays upright just fine. Looks nice. Mirror is real heavy glass and not weird plastic or metal.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, and good enough quality, that everyone now has one
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. The packaging is not at all "earth" friendly, so some may freak a bit but for the price paid you're certainly getting a good and easy to put together product. We now have one in everyone's room.
customer_reviews.author: iamFozz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror with good price
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a beautiful mirror with good price, I assume you can't find a better one with this price. It has been packed carefully, and the best part is easy to build, it only took me 5 mins I guess. The reason I didn't give it 5 stars is there are several scratches on the mirror that I can't get rid of, kinda annoying but it's not a big issue.
customer_reviews.author: Gotyep

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The legs are a little loose, and it's easy to over-tighten the bolts and rip out the threaded nut inserts. However, it does the job, and the optical clarity of the mirror is good.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: I regret buying this
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful mirror but it's too narrow, the adjustment screws at the side are weak (my tiny cat can use a single paw to easily push the mirror around no matter how much I tighten them) and the base is gigantic, so it's very awkward and doesn't quite fit anywhere properly. After one year of owning it, I wish I had a different mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: classic mirror! Does what it suppose to and is very durable once assembled! I have no complaints and glad i went with this purchase instead of a walmart version.
customer_reviews.author: Shuo Chen

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last. Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is beautiful and very easy to assemble but it doesn’t last. The stand is not sturdy. It has gotten more and more wobbly as time passed. I try to tighten it with the screw driver and it doesn’t tighten. The foot of it has cracked from the weight of the mirror and eventually collapsed. Now I am stuck with a standing mirror that does not stand.
customer_reviews.author: Kahlia

customer_reviews.title: It looks like the photo
customer_reviews.text: There were scuffs and all sorts of marks on the black/wood when I received it. It feels cheap, but it was cheap - so that makes sense. It looks like the photo, but if you're looking for perfection or an extremely nice quality...this isn't it. But it works for me and I'm not inspecting it up close and I highly doubt any of my guests will be either. All in all - worth the purchase. If you're looking for an inexpensive and decent mirror, i'd buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: purchases this for my wife so that she could have a full length mirror when she's getting all dolled up. she put it together while i was at work and let me tell you, i am amazed by the quality for the price. can't go wrong this this floor mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews, I was nervous my mirror would arrive with nicks and scratches. I was happy that I didn't have that and was in perfect condition. I'm not great with tools or furniture instructions and even I was able to assemble in less than 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cherry wood mirror. Took 10 minutes to assemble and was easy to do. It’s pretty sturdy but still light enough to move when needed. Great product for the value!
customer_reviews.author: Leese1019

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive, but isn't.
customer_reviews.text: This mirror was even better than I expected! It is a beautiful addition to our home and looks much more expensive that it was. I get asked about it alot.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is smaller than I thought it would be. Part of this appears to be because of the bottom that the mirror hovers over is included in the dimensions of the mirror. I actually love it now because it is able to move forward or move backwards. It is versatile and a gorgeous wooden color. It was quite easy to put together, took me about twenty minutes.
customer_reviews.author: KalistaK

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: I needed a mirror to match my traditional dark wood bedroom set. The color is a little more cherry than mahogany, but it works and is a nice, sturdy mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great balance between vintage and modern style. Sturdy and balanced, no issues. Reflection is accurate (not warped) and perfect for moving around the bedroom like I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: YJGuy

customer_reviews.title: It looks good and does it's job!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much when ordering this mirror but was pleasantly surprised when it arrived by how easy it was to assemble then how solid it was. I also expected the optical quality of the mirror to be less than it was but am very pleased with how clear the image is with no ripples as seen in cheap light weight mirrors. It now sits in the corner on its steady, simple base doing just what a iron should. It looks good and does its job.
customer_reviews.author: DWPT

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was undamaged, “So far, so good,” I thought; the glass of the mirror was in perfect shape...score! Put everything together...only to find multiple dings on the frame surrounding the mirror. Of course, all of the scuffs are on the front so they’re easy to see. *sigh*
customer_reviews.author: Christa Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Everything was wonderful about this low-priced, standing mirror. The great, espresso colored wood matches my other espresso colored furniture. It was easy to put together and shipped quickly. It arrived in fantastic shape with all its parts. And it truly does look a bit more expensive than it actually was. It was a great purchase. I would recommend it for small rooms and apartments. (I live in an apartment.) Right now it's sitting in my living room since my bedroom is a bit too small (it has a queen-sized bed and a larger dresser in it, taking up most of the space). But this mirror is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Belle

customer_reviews.title: this is easily the biggest mirror you'll find for the price
customer_reviews.text: The mirror came with packaging around it and there was no problems with the mirror itself. There were minor indentations into the wood in various spots but you have to look hard to find them. For less than $50, this is easily the biggest mirror you'll find for the price, but the frame isn't of great quality (as expected for such a deal!) . The assembly is easy, but if you move the mirror a lot, you'll have to tighten the sides every so often to make it so it'll be a little resistant to moving.
customer_reviews.author: Poring

customer_reviews.title: It had a crack on the wood frame
customer_reviews.text: Needed 2 people to assemble it, but otherwise easy to assemble. The mirror is in good shape, no distortion. The wood frame surrounding the mirror had about an 1.5 inch crack when we opened the box. We just put that cracked part on the bottom so it's not noticeable. I figured it's less hassle to keep it than return it.
customer_reviews.author: Riss

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Looking Glass
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this body mirror for our teenage daughter. She absolutely loves it! You can also find me using her full length body mirror on occassion too!
customer_reviews.author: Sequoia Hammel

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Good produce for the price. Sturdy, good quality mirror without paying an arm and a leg. Only thing stopping it from being excellent is that it does have some flaws. The mirror itself is lopsided a little bit, not terribly but just enough to notice. The sides of the frame are a little scratched and dented, again not terribly but can be noticed. Even with these flaws, for a product this price I would still purchase it. Overall still happy with my purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tamar Wiener

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but pretty
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice and was easy to put together. Great deal for the price but....it feels cheap. When you handle it it’s very lightweight. The price and look out ways the quality! So still a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Maysoon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant for the price but this is GREAT quality! Took less than 30 mins to assemble and is very sturdy! The color looks great and it’s the perfect size for a standard room
customer_reviews.author: Ciera Tuozzo

customer_reviews.title: Good full lenghted mirror
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say except it's a great full view mirror and a nice piece of furniture. Easy to assemble and sturdy. I like that you can tilt it to adjust your view.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it seriously!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received it today and when I opened the box this is what I got. I tried to ignore the reviews that maybe just maybe this wouldn’t happen to me but it did. Do not waste your money on this ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Miguelina Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Feminine bedroom
customer_reviews.text: The full length mirror that was a stand-up mirror was surprisingly beautiful. It was for my granddaughter's bedroom and made the newly painted and refurbished bedroom a young girl's dream. The price was great for the product produced. It is being used daily and is a much-needed addition to a girl's bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: BettyBoop

customer_reviews.title: Broken mirror
customer_reviews.text: I unbboxed my item and mirror is broken.Never happened to me sorry before,well one with the burned fan and now this.Check who's carrying this item is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Narvaez

customer_reviews.title: very cute
customer_reviews.text: i've never put a piece of furniture together in my entire life but this lovely lil mirror built my confidence up enough to go as far as building nightstands and drilling walls cuz it's so easy to put together. very sturdy legs also surprisingly. not a funhouse mirror which i also love about it. it tells the truth. it's a wee bit petite for my bf (5'4) so he has to swivel it (which it does so very safely without shaking the mirror around on the legs b/c the legs are so sturdy) but for me (4'11) it's just perfect to stand upright straight and not have to swivel around or step back to for a full-body view.
customer_reviews.author: Su

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Was super easy to put together. Packaged nice n tight. Looks great with my furniture. Exactly what I was Looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase - very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Kris11224
